cards.evo_description: Falling on account of so-called morals and ideals... Pathetic! Those too afraid to choose the fallen path themselves are doomed to constant change. But a proud soul like mine is wholly eternal!

cards.evo_description: Found you, vampire! You fiend! Carrying off all these beautiful damsels! I'm so jeal—I, I mean! I'm so angry at you! Prepare yourself for... Hm? You're actually kind of fetching yourself... Lemme just take a closer... Hey, come back!

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Randomly destroy 3 other followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 7 damage to your leader.
cards.org_skill_disc: [b]Fanfare[/b][b]:[/b] Randomly destroy 3 other followers. If [b]Vengeance[/b] is not active for you, deal 7 damage to your leader.
cards.evo_skill_disc: Evolve: If Vengeance is active for you, randomly deal 1 damage to a leader or another follower. Do this 9 times.
cards.org_evo_skill_disc: [b]Evolve[/b][b]:[/b] If [b]Vengeance[/b] is active for you, randomly deal 1 damage to a leader or another follower. Do this 9 times.
cards.description: Rage burgeons and swathes itself in layers of hatred, despair, ruin, and madness. It spins into the form of a demonic fist. White- and black-winged alike are blown away in a wave of indiscriminate, unreasoning violence.
cards.evo_description: No one knows what passion, what frustration, reverberates in that echoing howl. Before they can learn, all who hear it are returned to dust.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
cards.org_skill_disc: [b]Fanfare[/b][b]:[/b] Restore 3 defense to your leader. If an allied [b]Naterran Great Tree[/b] is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
cards.evo_skill_disc:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effects.
-At the end of your turn, if you have at least 8 cards in your hand, randomly discard cards until you have 7, then deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals 2 times the number of cards discarded.
-At the start of your turn, draw a card.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)

cards.description:
At last we have found the dark deity. Let us fall to our knees in reverence. The abnormal bat, werewolf, and vampire. All. Sprang. From this. This font. The font of. Madness. Madness itself.
—Survey team captain's scrawled journal entry
cards.evo_description:
Great, great, great, great, great deity. No. Myself? Your power. Please. Stop? It will spread. Outward. Without. Cease. No good. Madness.
—Twisted scrawl

Rush.

cards.description: Indeed I am the Seven of Swords, mark of inequity. Vows be broken, contracts be damned. I live for myself. I invite you to partake in foul inequity and frivolous injustice for my amusement.
cards.evo_description: Allow me to whisper sweet nightmares into your ears. Everyone is merely a piece in a bigger game. Friend or foe, I make no distinction. I just want to sneer at the world.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: If there are no duplicate cards in your deck (excluding Volteo, Hedonistic Dealer), deal 5 damage to all other followers and give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier, then put a random follower (excluding Volteo, Hedonistic Dealer) from your deck into play. Do this 2 times. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)

Do this 2 times. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
cards.description:
Ah, my fledgling star. Welcome. You have been selected as a candidate to become the newest casino manager! You just have to put it all on the line—position, wealth, life! Now the true gamble begins!
—Diamond Casino, Diamond Floor
cards.evo_description:
Hah! This gamble was not a test of your prowess! It was all lies! I let you win from the very start! Well, you wagered your life and now it's time to collect! Bon appetit!
—Diamond Casino, Diamond Floor

----------

cards.description: From a bloodstained cape, flame-wreathed arms reach out to embrace animus. As the demon raises a fist, the heavens fall, blanketing the horizon in darkness. It is the hatred of countless souls incarnate; its smile is a harbinger of the end.
cards.evo_description: The beginning of despair is the end of hope—and the decreed hour is come. From the primordial abyss shall flow an everlasting night that swallows the world. From the dungeon of darkness the abomination will smile, knowing its work is done.

cards.description:
In nature, the tail of the scorpion is akin to a lure—its body is the real threat. There is, however, nothing natural about this specimen. Both the mouth and tail of this abomination hungrily seek prey.
—Desert Ecology, Fiendish Beasts
cards.evo_description:
There is meaning in life, both natural and unnatural. With its two mouths and one stomach, the two-headed scorpion maximizes consumption of all life, down to tufts of desert moss.
—Desert Ecology, Fiendish Beasts

cards.description:
"The world drowned in the deluge, sparing the righteous people aboard the ark. That's how the story goes... but the truth must be told. We found the ark... or rather, the sinister blight it had become."
—Explorer's Scrawled Notes
cards.evo_description:
"The flood wasn't meant to punish man; it was meant to destroy the fiend, though all attempts were unsuccessful. Instead, the daemon was sealed and set afloat on the ark. But heaven help us, we unsealed it. The ark of calamity—"
—Explorer's Cut-Off Notes

cards.description: These faces are emblems of my love; the manifestation of blood I have spilled for the world. I've become the beasts I've devoured—a small price to pay for love. Ah, are you afraid of me? That's fine, too. It'll all be over once the last monster has been slain.
cards.evo_description: There is no love in these faces! There never was! I've drowned myself in rivers of blood, writhed in pain under my own blade... So why does no one love me?! This body, these wounds, they were all for you! Oh, dear world, I love you... and that's why we'll die together.

cards.description: The wolf gains on its prey; paws hammering the earth faster than the creature's frantic heartbeat. It consumes every part of the creature's being, claiming its power.
cards.evo_description: With little but shreds of the creature remaining, the wolf turns its bloody maw to the dim moon above. It lets out a terrible howl—a warning.

I once knew happiness. But the past is the past, so I keep moving forward... no matter what hardships await me.
—Luca Yonazuki

With strength, I can save Shiori. I have to become stronger. That's why I play Shadowverse...
The time for Vengeance has come—Dark Emperor!
—Luca Yonazuki

cards.description:
You managed to change, but I didn't. I guess it's obvious who my rival was always destined to be... It was you all along.
—Rei Saotome
cards.evo_description:
I will rule over Shadowverse as its king! And then I'll keep winning and winning... because why even bother playing otherwise?
Bathe them in crimson! Bloodlust Demon!
—Rei Saotome

cards.description: I am the living embodiment of revenge. I draw strength from the darkness within human hearts. Hatred... Envy... Soon this world will be filled with resentment!
cards.evo_description: The world is filled with hatred, and the time for revenge is upon us! My dark arts shall skewer the hearts of the hypocrites and pin their souls to the tombstone of resentment!

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Change both leaders' defense to 10, either by restoring defense or by dealing damage.
cards.org_skill_disc: [b]Fanfare[/b][b]:[/b] Change both leaders' defense to 10, either by restoring defense or by dealing damage.
cards.description: Though my soul may fall, I shall never bow my head to such weak, stunted creatures as mortals. I still possess a measure of pride.
cards.evo_description: When the time came, we sounded the battle cry against the gods that deceived us... As fellow traitors, you are now compelled to follow me.

cards.evo_description: The tremendous, frenzied serpent is nothing less than a calamity that swallows the heavens and the earth. It crushes everything without discrimination, returning it to nothingness like some sort of divine judge.

cards.description: Afflicted and annihilated, one oozes into the ebon abyss. Look and fear, human. There lurks despair: one who preys on iniquitous flesh and the bones of the besmirched. —The Abyss, Chapter 2, Verse 4
cards.evo_description: Be drenched! Oh, cry out beyond the edge! All is swallowed and flows into the lightless depths. The day has begun—a day longer than eternity and shorter than a blink. —The Abyss, Finale, Verse 1

cards.description: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. Legend has it he once served as guardian angel to a great prophet, but the truth has been lost to time.
cards.evo_description: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. He grants strength to the vengeful, spurring them on to retribution. Legend has it he himself yearns to rebel against the heavens, but the truth has been lost to time.

cards.description: It was humans who spilled blood upon my soil. One good turn deserves another, so I'll see them painted in the same crimson. Yes, caught in my briars and pierced by my thorns... Oh, how red they'll bloom.
cards.evo_description: The more blood my roses drink, the more crimson they bloom. Yes, this place is my paradise, but for those foolish humans, it is both purgatory and hell.

cards.description:
"That vanilla stuff? A little boring, don't you think?"
One look into her eyes is all it takes to fall into the hells of romance.
"You can have it... a passionate love more intense than anything you've ever felt."
cards.evo_description:
"I've lost my taste for those sweet, happy endings."
The incarnation of beauty itself smiled bewitchingly, her prey completely enraptured.
"But you'll give me what I really want, right? All I need is a taste of that bitter, delicious despair."

cards.description: Avert your eyes. Seal your breath. Even the ends of the heavens are unsafe from its grasps. Before you is a wretched garden, whose thorns prey on the skin of the ignorant. Turn around, and the voices of despair shall call you once more. —The Abyss, Chapter 3, Verse 6
cards.evo_description:
His arm, in the deepest depths of its organs. Within the screaming throat, darkness blooms. The nightmare becometh real, bringing forth a new life. Ah... To be born with sin. A new song echoes.
—The Abyss, Finale, Verse 5

cards.evo_description: The humans' relieved gazes pleased the ogre greatly; he especially relished seeing them fade to wide-eyed despair when he started swinging the ball and chain over his head.

cards.evo_description: Step outside your facade and cast aside your mortal ties, for tonight we revel. Tonight you will surrender to the tantalizing taste of my company!

cards.evo_description: At her second roar, even the skies shall pale in fear. The haughty queen of frozen earth is an ice-cloaked avatar of terror.

cards.description:
Truth is waste. Your world has been reshaped.
I am Temperance, patron of austerity.
There is only one necessity:
Reality.
cards.evo_description:
Hopes. Dreams. Memories. These are tools of hedonism.
Sever all luxuries; leave only thy corporeal self.
Discard excess. Learn what is needed:
Rationality.

cards.evo_description: Reason? Hell if I know. I'm so mad I forgot why I'm mad! Maybe pounding your face in will jog my memory!

cards.evo_skill_disc: (Same as the unevolved form.)
cards.description: After abducting the bodies of the living, he transfigures them completely. Assembled are instruments of resentment to perform malicious symphonies for his orchestra of slaughter.
cards.evo_description: The tones are striking and coarse—too intense for a human to endure. His otherworldly music twists the ears and crumples the heart. Upon the finale is an ovation from demonkind, as all that remains is death and destruction.

cards.skill_disc:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. If Vengeance is active for you, summon 2 Serpents and give all allied Serpents Ward.

cards.description: This is the form you find most alluring? How charming—how obscene—I'm rather fond of it. Well, time to get down to business. I'm here to damn you, after all.
cards.evo_description: It's only natural to lose yourself to indulgence and madness. After all, I'm going to make this night last as long as I can. We'll see if your body lasts until morning.

During your turn, whenever another allied amulet comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.

----------

cards.evo_skill_disc: (Same as the unevolved form.)
cards.description: Follow not the cursed threads. Their source is illness incarnate, and it spins a web of madness. It speaks in cacophony and abides in distortion. Hear or see it once, and there is no return. Cover your ears; still the sound seeps in. Close your eyes; still the image blazes.
cards.evo_description:
Silver, holy water, even the sun... There is nothing left that can restrain me. You think these tendrils of madness tenacious? Watch me sever them with steel. The moonstruck night is over. And when day breaks, I begin.
—A Vampire with Pure Silver Wings

cards.skill_disc:
Accelerate (1): Put an Eccentric Archdemon into your deck. Draw a card.
----------
Accelerate (4): Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. If X is at least 2, deal 4 damage to all enemies instead. X equals the number of other Eccentric Archdemons you've played using Accelerate this match.
----------
Accelerate (7): Restore 7 defense to your leader. Then, if X is at least 4, summon 2 Eccentric Archdemons.
----------
Storm.

cards.evo_skill_disc: (Same as the unevolved form.)
cards.description: Behold my latest creation! Humans are so much fun and their culture is fascinating. I've decided to try my hand at what they call "avant-garde." I mean, straight up killing people is what philistines do, right?
cards.evo_description: Humans are so creative! They've created so many ways to inflict pain on each other! Guess they can't afford to waste time, seeing as their lives are short and fragile. I need to step up my game... There's nothing more boring than just copying the work of the great masters.

cards.skill_disc:
When this card is added to your hand from your deck, subtract X from its cost. X equals twice the number of times you've played a Bloodsoaked Archdemon using its Accelerate effect.
----------
Accelerate (1): Draw a card. Put a Bloodsoaked Archdemon into your deck.
----------
Rush.
After Clashing with an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, fully restore its defense and deal 5 damage to the enemy leader.

cards.evo_skill_disc: (Same as the unevolved form.)
cards.description: They pursue me relentlessly. They rack me and slice at my flesh. I desire naught but love and peace. I do not wish to fight. Devils, O foul devils, begone. Why will you not leave me be?
cards.evo_description: Without warning, they are racked and sliced; there is no time to wail or gnash teeth. Their tormentor calls them devils while begging for mercy; all the while his hands are never idle. He is the devil, a diseased soul trapped in a victimhood of his own making.
